name: middleware-manager
description: Middleware Manager is a self-hosted control panel for managing and monitoring middleware services in distributed environments. It offers a dashboard, logs, and integration with Kubernetes and cloud providers.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor health, status, and performance of middleware components across distributed infrastructure

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Collect and search logs from multiple services in a centralized interface for faster debugging

features.title: Configuration Management
features.description: Update service settings and environment variables without direct server access or restarts

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Deploy and manage middleware on K8s clusters with automated health checks and scaling

features.title: Cloud Provider Support
features.description: Connect to AWS, Azure, and GCP to manage services across hybrid and multi-cloud environments

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive warnings about service failures, resource limits, or performance degradation via email or webhooks

features.title: REST API
features.description: Automate management tasks and integrate with CI/CD pipelines using REST API for programmatic control
